testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User on the login page................................................passed Given User enetrs valid Username "admin" and Password "Admin@123"...........passed And Clicks on Login.........................................................passed And Click on Menu icon......................................................passed Then Click on Marketing icon................................................passed And Click on Affiliates.....................................................passed Then Click on Add New.......................................................passed Then Enter First Name "Neeraj", Last Name "Chopra", E-Mail "rohit@gmail.com", Telephone "6789373", Tracking Code "62b9873eb00bf", Password "Admin@123", Confirm "123456", Address 1 "Abcd Place India", City "Delhi", Country "Inida" and State "Delhi".passed Then Click on Payment details...............................................passed And Enter the Cheque Payee Name "Mr coder"..................................passed And Click on Save...........................................................passed
